content:
Q: What hours am I allowed to work on a Stamp 2 visa?
A: Students must have registered with ISD and received your IRP card- if you have not registered you are not eligible for work. Under the conditions of a student visa (stamp 2) you can work up to 20 hours a week during term time. This includes while doing dissertation or waiting for results. This is extended up to 40 hours a week during a holiday period, June to September inclusive and from 15 December to 15 January.

metadata.source_file: FAQs from Students at Dublin Business School.pdf
metadata.question: What hours am I allowed to work on a Stamp 2 visa?
